languages.text: {n}Монстр издает тоскливый вой — голосом Ахиллеаса.{/n} "Мастер ван Калокс, вы живы... я надеялся, что смерть забрала вас раньше, чем эти чудовища взялись за вас так же, как за меня..."
{n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."
languages.original_text: {n}Монстр издает тоскливый вой — голосом Ахиллеаса.{/n} "Мастер ван Калокс, вы живы... я надеялся, что смерть забрала вас раньше, чем эти чудовища взялись за вас так же, как за меня..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."

{n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."

languages.text: {n}怪物はアキレアスの声で悲痛な叫びを発した。{/n}「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス、生きていたのですね…私は…あの怪物たちが私にしたようなことをあなたにする前に、死があなたを連れ去ってくれることを願っていました…」
languages.original_text: {n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物はアキレアスの声で悲痛な叫びを発した。{/n}「マスター・ヴァン・カロックス、生きていたのですね…私は…あの怪物たちが私にしたようなことをあなたにする前に、死があなたを連れ去ってくれることを願っていました…」

languages.text: {n}怪物以阿吉里亚斯的声音发出了痛苦的嚎叫。{/n}“冯·卡洛克斯大师，你还活着……我本希望你早就死了，这样你就不用像我这样落在那些怪物手里，遭到非人的折磨……”
languages.original_text: {n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物以阿吉里亚斯的声音发出了痛苦的嚎叫。{/n}“冯·卡洛克斯大师，你还活着……我本希望你早就死了，这样你就不用像我这样落在那些怪物手里，遭到非人的折磨……”

languages.text: {n}La criatura emite un aullido angustiado con la voz de Achilleas.{/n} «Maestro van Calox, está vivo... Esperaba que la muerte le hubiera reclamado antes de que esos monstruos pudieran hacerle lo que me hicieron a mí...».
languages.original_text: {n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura emite un aullido angustiado con la voz de Achilleas.{/n} «Maestro van Calox, está vivo... Esperaba que la muerte le hubiera reclamado antes de que esos monstruos pudieran hacerle lo que me hicieron a mí...».

languages.text: {n}Das Monster stößt in Achilleas' Stimme ein verzweifeltes Geheul aus.{/n} "Meister van Calox, Ihr lebt ... Ich hatte gehofft, der Tod hätte Euch geholt, bevor diese Monster Euch antun können, was sie mir angetan haben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Monster stößt in Achilleas' Stimme ein verzweifeltes Geheul aus.{/n} "Meister van Calox, Ihr lebt ... Ich hatte gehofft, der Tod hätte Euch geholt, bevor diese Monster Euch antun können, was sie mir angetan haben ..."

languages.text: {n}Avec la voix d'Achilleas, le monstre laisse échapper un hurlement bouleversé.{/n} « Maître von Calox, vous êtes en vie... J'espérais que vous étiez mort avant que ces monstres ne vous mettent la main dessus pour vous faire ce qu'ils m'ont fait... »
languages.original_text: {n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec la voix d'Achilleas, le monstre laisse échapper un hurlement bouleversé.{/n} « Maître von Calox, vous êtes en vie... J'espérais que vous étiez mort avant que ces monstres ne vous mettent la main dessus pour vous faire ce qu'ils m'ont fait... »

languages.text: {n}Canavar, Achilleas'ın sesiyle üzgün bir şekilde uluyor.{/n} "Üstat van Calox, yaşıyorsunuz... Bu yaratıkların bana yaptıklarını size de yapmaya kalkışmalarından evvel ölümün sizi bulmasını ummuştum."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster lets out a distressed howl in Achilleas's voice.{/n} "Master van Calox, you are alive... I hoped death had taken you before those monsters could do to you what they had done to me..."
